webex-suite.name: Webex Suite
webex-suite.description: The first purpose-built solution for hybrid work, with everything you need to collaborateâ€”all in one economical offer.
features: Engaging video meetings with up to 1,000 participants.
A powerful cloud phone system and PSTN business phone number.
Team messaging, secure file sharing, and bi-directional whiteboarding.
Interactive audience engagement with polling, quizzes, Q&A, and more.
Virtual events with up to 5,000 attendees, or multi-session events with live streaming and peer networking.
Asynchronous video messaging for recording and sharing videos.

categoryPage.altText: A professional in a headset sits outside, collaborating remotely via Webex on a mobile phone.

webex-assistant.name: Webex Assistant
webex-assistant.description: Meet your personal virtual assistant that helps keep everyone on time and on track.
features: Start your meeting, book a room, and more using simple voice commands.
Capture action items and get detailed transcripts and notes for every meeting.
Control room amenities such as lighting and temperature.

webex-go.name: Webex Go
webex-go.description: Eliminate the need to carry around multiple mobile devices by using your personal phone to make and receive calls with your business phone number.
features: Access powerful calling features on your business line through your personal mobile device.
Route calls over the mobile network for more reliable voice quality.
Make personal mobile devices secure and compliant endpoints for your business.
Centrally manage mobile devices in the same place as the rest of your collaboration solutions.
